Description: Sherd (base). With caricatured peacock and inscription. Made of black painted and green, cobalt stained and green glazed, crackled and black-brown decorated pottery (buff).
Bibliographic references: Wallis 1891 / Persian Ceramic Art Belonging to Mr F DuCane Godman, FRS: The Thirteenth Century Lustred Vases (Appendix pl.vii.12)
Wallis 1900 / The Oriental Influence on the Ceramic Art of the Italian Renaissance (fig.33.2)
